databaseap.ap-sql: SELECT curdate()
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), "%d-%m-%Y") as date
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), "%m-%d-%Y") as date
SELECT curtime()
SELECT appointment_date from appointment WHERE appointment_no=${appt_no}

SELECT appointment_date, DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i') AS start_time FROM appointment WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} AND ADDTIME(appointment_date, start_time) >= NOW() AND `status` NOT IN('C', 'N', 'NS') ORDER BY appointment_date asc, start_time asc LIMIT 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%H:%i') AS start_time FROM appointment WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} AND ADDTIME(appointment_date, start_time) >= NOW() AND `status` NOT IN('C', 'N', 'NS') ORDER BY appointment_date asc, start_time asc LIMIT 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(appointment_date, '%Y-%b-%d' ) AS nextf_appt_date FROM appointment WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} AND ADDTIME(appointment_date, start_time) >= NOW() AND status NOT IN ('C', 'N', 'NS') ORDER BY appointment_date asc, start_time asc LIMIT 1

SELECT location FROM appointment WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} AND ADDTIME(appointment_date, start_time) >= NOW() AND status NOT IN ('C', 'N', 'NS') ORDER BY appointment_date asc, start_time asc LIMIT 1;
SELECT ${fid} AS fid
SELECT ${fdid} AS fdid
SELECT provider.first_name, provider.last_name FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.first_name FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.last_name FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.first_name, provider.last_name FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.ohip_no FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.specialty FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'

SELECT MID( comments, INSTR(comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')+22, INSTR(comments,'</xml_p_specialty_code>')-INSTR(comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')-22 ) AS specialty_code FROM provider WHERE provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.practitionerNo FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT '${loggedInProvider}' AS providerId
SELECT providerExt.signature FROM providerExt WHERE providerExt.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.first_name, provider.last_name FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.address FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT ExtractValue(provider.comments, '/xml_p_fax') AS fax FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.email FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider.work_phone FROM provider WHERE provider.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT group_concat(role_name) as roles FROM secUserRole where provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT provider_type FROM provider where provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT '${loggedInProvider}' as loggedInProviderId
SELECT p.alberta_tak_no as takno FROM provider p WHERE p.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT p.alberta_connect_care_id as ccid FROM provider p WHERE p.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT p.ontario_lifelabs_id as llid FROM provider p WHERE p.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT p.alberta_tak_no as takno FROM provider p WHERE p.provider_no='${loggedInProvider}'
SELECT p.alberta_tak_no AS takno FROM provider p JOIN appointment a ON p.provider_no=a.provider_no WHERE a.appointment_no='${appt_no}'
SELECT p.alberta_connect_care_id AS ccid FROM provider p JOIN appointment a ON p.provider_no=a.provider_no WHERE a.appointment_no='${appt_no}'
SELECT p.ontario_lifelabs_id AS llid FROM provider p JOIN appointment a ON p.provider_no=a.provider_no WHERE a.appointment_no='${appt_no}'
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTRING(first_name, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTRING(first_name FROM 2))) AS first_name, CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTRING(last_name, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTRING(last_name FROM 2))) AS last_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT last_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
databaseap.ap-insql: UPDATE demographic SET last_name='${value}' WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

databaseap.ap-sql: SELECT first_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
databaseap.ap-insql: UPDATE demographic SET first_name='${value}' WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

databaseap.ap-sql: SELECT alias FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
databaseap.ap-insql: UPDATE demographic SET alias='${value}' WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

databaseap.ap-sql: SELECT '${demographic}' AS demographicId
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT address, city, province, postal FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT address, city, province, postal FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT province FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT city FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT postal FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth, month_of_birth, year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth, month_of_birth, year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth, month_of_birth, year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth, month_of_birth, year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT year_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT month_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT date_of_birth FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT * FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT hin, ver FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT hin FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT ver FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT hc_type FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT hc_renew_date FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT chart_no FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT phone FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT phone2 FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT value FROM demographicExt WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} and key_val ='demo_cell';
SELECT value FROM demographicExt WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} and key_val ='hPhoneExt';
SELECT value FROM demographicExt WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} and key_val ='wPhoneExt';

SELECT (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE, 5) < RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5)) AS 'age' FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT (MONTH(CURDATE()) - MONTH(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'))) - IF(DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE( )) < DAYOFMONTH(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')),1,0) + (12*(YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)-YEAR(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d')))-(RIGHT(CURRENT_DATE, 5) < RIGHT(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d'),5))) AS 'age' FROM demographic demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT CASE WHEN (@bdate >= DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 2 DAY)) THEN 'newborn' WHEN (@bdate >= DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY)) THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, @bdate, CURRENT_DATE),' day old') WHEN (@bdate >= DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 4 WEEK)) THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(WEEK, @bdate, CURRENT_DATE),' week old') WHEN (@bdate >= DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 11 MONTH)) THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, @bdate, CURRENT_DATE),' month old') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, @bdate, CURRENT_DATE), ' year old') END AS ageComplex FROM (SELECT @bdate:= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT((demographic.year_of_birth), '-', (demographic.month_of_birth), '-', (demographic.date_of_birth)),'%Y-%m-%d') AS birthdate FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}) as t

SELECT CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,t.birthdate, CURDATE()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, t.birthdate, CURDATE()), ' days old') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, t.birthdate, CURDATE()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, t.birthdate, CURDATE()), ' months ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(WEEK, DATE_ADD(t.birthdate, INTERVAL TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, t.birthdate, CURDATE()) MONTH), CURDATE()), ' weeks old') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, t.birthdate, CURDATE()), " years ", MOD(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, t.birthdate, CURDATE()), 12), " months") END AS ageComplex2 FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(d.year_of_birth, '-', d.month_of_birth, '-', d.date_of_birth), '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthdate FROM demographic d WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}) t
SELECT sex FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT sin FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT name_of_mother FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT name_of_father FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT lp.producer_name AS producer_name FROM demographic_licensed_producer d JOIN licensed_producer lp ON (d.producer_id=lp.producer_id) where d.demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT lp.producer_name AS producer_name FROM demographic_licensed_producer d JOIN licensed_producer lp ON (d.producer_id2=lp.producer_id) where d.demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT pa.display_name as address_name FROM demographic_licensed_producer d JOIN licensed_producer_address pa ON (d.address_id=pa.address_id) where d.demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT pa.province as province FROM demographic_licensed_producer d JOIN licensed_producer_address pa ON (d.address_id=pa.address_id) where d.demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(pa.display_name SEPARATOR ';') as list FROM licensed_producer_address pa

SELECT pa.address as address, pa.city as city, pa.province as province, pa.postal as postal FROM demographic_licensed_producer d JOIN licensed_producer_address pa ON (d.address_id=pa.address_id) where d.demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(pa.address, '\n', pa.city, ', ', pa.province, ', ', pa.postal SEPARATOR ';') AS list FROM licensed_producer_address pa
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(producer_name ORDER BY producer_name SEPARATOR ';' ) as list FROM licensed_producer
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(name,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS name_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(fax,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS fax_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(REPLACE(phone,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS phone_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(address,';',''), ' ', REPLACE(city,';',''), ' ', REPLACE(province,';',''), ' ', REPLACE(postal,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS address_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(address,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS address_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(city,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS city_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(province,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS province_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(postal,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS postal_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(alberta_connect_care_lab_id,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS lab_id_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(alberta_connect_care_department_id,';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS department_id_list FROM site WHERE status=1 ORDER BY site_id;

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(icd9.description SEPARATOR ', ') AS dxlist FROM icd9, dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND coding_system='icd9' AND icd9.icd9=dxresearch.dxresearch_code AND demographic_no=${demographic};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT billing_on_item.dx) AS ohipdxc FROM billing_on_item, billing_on_cheader1 WHERE billing_on_cheader1.id=billing_on_item.ch1_id AND billing_on_cheader1.demographic_no=${demographic};

SELECT IF ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM allergies, demographic WHERE ( demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived=1))>0, CONCAT((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ') FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived != 1),' \n','archived allergies:',(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ') FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived = 1)), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ') FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived != 1)) as allergy

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(allergies.DESCRIPTION SEPARATOR ', ')as allergy FROM allergies, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND allergies.demographic_no=demographic.demographic_no AND allergies.archived != 1

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(p.date_prescribed,' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(p.textView, '

', -1)),' 
' ORDER BY p.date_prescribed DESC SEPARATOR '') AS rx FROM prescription p WHERE p.demographic_no=${demographic} and p.date_prescribed=LEFT(now(),10)

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT IF (LENGTH(d.GN) > 4, GN, d.customName), IF (d.takemax > d.takemin, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,'-',d.takemax, ' '), IF (d.takemin != 0, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,' '), CONCAT(' '))), COALESCE(d.freqcode, ''), IF (d.prn=1, ' prn', '') ORDER BY d.rx_date DESC SEPARATOR ' \n' ) AS rxlist FROM drugs d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.end_date > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND d.archived='0';

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT IF (LENGTH(d.GN) > 4, BN, d.customName), IF (d.takemax > d.takemin, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,'-',d.takemax,' '), IF (d.takemin != 0, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,' '), CONCAT(' '))), COALESCE(d.freqcode, ''), IF (d.prn=1, ' prn', '') ORDER BY d.rx_date DESC SEPARATOR ' \n' ) AS rxlist FROM drugs d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.end_date > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND d.archived='0';

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT IF (LENGTH(d.GN) > 4, CONCAT(UCASE(SUBSTRING(d.BN, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTRING(d.BN, 2))),d.customName), IF (d.takemax > d.takemin, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,'-',d.takemax,' '), IF (d.takemin != 0, CONCAT(' ',d.takemin,' '), CONCAT(' '))), COALESCE(d.freqcode, ''), IF (d.prn=1, ' prn', '') ORDER BY d.rx_date DESC SEPARATOR ', ' ) AS rxlist FROM drugs d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.end_date > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND d.archived='0';

SELECT cmn.note AS note FROM casemgmt_note cmn JOIN (SELECT uuid FROM casemgmt_note cmn LEFT JOIN casemgmt_note_link cmnl ON cmn.note_id = cmnl.note_id WHERE cmn.demographic_no = ${demographic} GROUP BY uuid HAVING SUM(IF(cmnl.note_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0)) = 0 ORDER BY MAX(observation_date) DESC LIMIT 1) AS A ON (cmn.uuid = A.uuid) WHERE cmn.demographic_no=${demographic} ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT c_finalEDB FROM formONAREnhancedRecord f where demographic_no=${demographic} order by ID desc limit 1;
SELECT CONCAT('G',pg1_gravida,' T', pg1_term ,' P', pg1_preterm ,' A', pg1_abortion, ' L', pg1_living ) AS bcGTPAL FROM formBCAR2012 where demographic_no=${demographic} ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT EXTRACTVALUE(provider.comments, '/xml_p_billinggroup_no') AS billing_group_no FROM provider WHERE provider_no = ${loggedInProvider}
SELECT provider.first_name, provider.last_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.first_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.last_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider_no FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT provider.ohip_no FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no

SELECT MID( p.comments, INSTR(p.comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')+22, INSTR(p.comments,'</xml_p_specialty_code>')-INSTR(p.comments,'<xml_p_specialty_code>')-22 ) AS specialty_code FROM provider p, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND d.provider_no=p.provider_no
SELECT provider.practitionerNo FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.practitionerNo FROM provider, appointment WHERE appointment.appointment_no=${appt_no} AND appointment.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.email FROM provider JOIN appointment as appt ON appt.provider_no=provider.provider_no WHERE appt.appointment_no=${appt_no}
SELECT provider.specialty FROM provider, appointment WHERE appointment.appointment_no=${appt_no} AND appointment.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.title FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.last_name, provider.first_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
select substring(provider.first_name,1,1) as first_init,provider.last_name FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.specialty FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.ontario_lifelabs_id as llid FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.work_phone FROM provider, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=provider.provider_no
SELECT provider.email FROM provider JOIN demographic as demo ON provider.provider_no = demo.provider_no WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT provider.alberta_connect_care_id FROM provider JOIN demographic as demo ON provider.provider_no = demo.provider_no WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
SELECT providerExt.signature FROM providerExt, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND demographic.provider_no=providerExt.provider_no
SELECT provider_no FROM appointment WHERE appointment_no=${appt_no}
SELECT ${appt_no} as appt_no

SELECT CASE WHEN (ps.lName IS NULL AND ps.fName IS NULL) OR LENGTH(ps.referralNo) = 0 THEN EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rd') ELSE CONCAT(ps.lName, ", ", ps.fName) END as referral_doc_name FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON (EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = ps.referralNo) WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT CASE WHEN (ps.lName IS NULL AND ps.fName IS NULL) OR LENGTH(ps.referralNo) = 0 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rd'), ',', -1) ELSE ps.fName END as referral_doc_first_name FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON (EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = ps.referralNo) WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT CASE WHEN (ps.lName IS NULL AND ps.fName IS NULL) OR LENGTH(ps.referralNo) = 0 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rd'), ',', 1) ELSE ps.lName END as referral_doc_last_name FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON (EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = ps.referralNo) WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic}

SELECT professionalSpecialists.address AS raddress FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT professionalSpecialists.phone FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT professionalSpecialists.fax FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT professionalSpecialists.referralNo AS referral_no FROM professionalSpecialists, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(professionalSpecialists.referralNo) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = professionalSpecialists.referralNo

SELECT billingreferral.last_name, billingreferral.first_name FROM billingreferral, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(billingreferral.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = billingreferral.referral_no

SELECT billingreferral.first_name FROM billingreferral, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(billingreferral.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = billingreferral.referral_no

SELECT billingreferral.last_name FROM billingreferral, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(billingreferral.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = billingreferral.referral_no

SELECT CONCAT( COALESCE(b.address1, ''), IF( COALESCE(b.address1, '') ='', '', '\n' ), COALESCE(b.address2, ''), IF( COALESCE(b.address2, '') ='', '', '\n' ) , b.city, ' ', b.province, ' ', b.postal ) AS raddress FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = b.referral_no
SELECT b.phone FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = b.referral_no
SELECT b.fax FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = b.referral_no
SELECT b.referral_no FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor, '/rdohip') = b.referral_no
SELECT clinic_name FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_phone FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_fax FROM clinic
SELECT email FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_address FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT * FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_delim_phone AS clinic_multi_phone FROM clinic
SELECT clinic_delim_fax AS clinic_multi_fax FROM clinic
SELECT alberta_connect_care_lab_id FROM clinic
SELECT alberta_connect_care_department_id FROM clinic
SELECT var_value FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND fdid= (SELECT MIN(fdid) FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1)
SELECT var_value FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND fdid= (SELECT MAX(fdid) FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1)
SELECT var_name AS fieldname, var_value AS fieldvalue FROM eform_values WHERE fdid= (SELECT MIN(fdid) FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1)
SELECT var_name AS fieldname, var_value AS fieldvalue FROM eform_values WHERE fdid= (SELECT MAX(fdid) FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1)

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND var_value='${var_value}' AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1)

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1)

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND var_value='${var_value}' AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND var_value='${ref_var_value}' AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1))

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND var_value='${ref_var_value}' AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1))

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND var_value='${var_value}' AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1))

SELECT count(0) FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_values WHERE var_name='${ref_var_name}' AND NOT (var_value='' OR var_value IS NULL) AND fdid IN (SELECT fdid FROM eform_data WHERE demographic_no='${eform_demographic}' AND fid=${fid} AND status=1))
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'dtap-ipv-hib' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'Flu' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'FOBT' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'MAM' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select prevention_date from preventions p where p.prevention_type = 'PAP' and p.deleted = '0' and p.demographic_no = ${demographic} order by p.prevention_date desc limit 1
select value from demographicExt d where d.key_val = 'cytolNum' and d.demographic_no = ${demographic};
select d.first_name, d.last_name, d.address, d.city, d.province, d.postal from relationships r, demographic d where r.relation_demographic_no = d.demographic_no and r.demographic_no = ${demographic}

select d.first_name, d.last_name, d.address, d.city, d.province, d.postal from DemographicContact r, demographic d where r.contactId = d.demographic_no and r.sdm = 'true' and r.demographicNo = ${demographic}
SELECT email FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no=${demographic}
select billing_date from billing_on_cheader1 where id=${invoiceNo}
select ref_num from billing_on_cheader1 where id=${invoiceNo}
select ifnull((select format(sum(fee),2) from billing_on_item where ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and status !='D'),'0.00') as fees
select ifnull((select format(sum(value),2) from billing_on_ext where billing_no=${invoiceNo} and status='1' and key_val='payment'),'0.00') as payment
select ifnull((select format(sum(value),2) from billing_on_ext where billing_no=${invoiceNo} and status='1' and key_val='refund'),'0.00') as refund

select format((select ifnull((select format(sum(fee),2) as fees from billing_on_item where ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and status !='D'),'0.00') - (select ifnull((select format(sum(value),2) as payment from billing_on_ext where billing_no=${invoiceNo} and status='1' and key_val='payment'),'0.00')) - (select ifnull((select format(sum(value),2) as refund from billing_on_ext where billing_no=${invoiceNo} and status='1' and key_val='refund'),'0.00'))),2) as balance_owing

select GROUP_CONCAT(id SEPARATOR '
') as billing_id from billing_on_item where ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and status != 'D' order by id

select GROUP_CONCAT(description SEPARATOR '
') as billing_desc from billingservice b, billing_on_item bi where b.service_code=bi.service_code and bi.ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and bi.status !='D' and b.billingservice_no = (select max(b2.billingservice_no) from billingservice b2 where b.service_code = b2.service_code and b2.billingservice_date <= now()) order by bi.id

select GROUP_CONCAT(service_code SEPARATOR '
') as billing_service_code from billing_on_item where ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and status != 'D' order by id

select GROUP_CONCAT(ser_num SEPARATOR '
') as billing_qty from billing_on_item where ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and status != 'D' order by id

select GROUP_CONCAT(dx SEPARATOR '
') as billing_dx from billing_on_item where ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and status != 'D' order by id

select GROUP_CONCAT(format(fee,2) SEPARATOR '
') as billing_fee from billing_on_item where ch1_id=${invoiceNo} and status != 'D' order by id

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( REPLACE(CONCAT( IFNULL(Q.obsDate, ''),'|', IFNULL(Q.height, ''), '|', IFNULL(Q.weight, ''), '|', IFNULL(Q.circ, ''), '|', IFNULL(REPLACE(Q.comments,'|',''), '')),';','') SEPARATOR ';') AS list FROM ( SELECT DATE(m.dateObserved) AS obsDate, MAX(IF(m.type='HT', m.dataField, NULL)) AS height, MAX(IF(m.type='WT', m.dataField, NULL)) AS weight, MAX(IF(m.type='HEAD', m.dataField, NULL)) AS circ, MAX(m.comments) as comments
FROM measurements m WHERE m.type IN ('HT', 'WT', 'HEAD') AND m.demographicNo='${demographic}' GROUP BY DATE(m.dateObserved) ) AS Q ORDER BY Q.obsDate DESC

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.first_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.firstName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.fName, ''), '') ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.last_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.lastName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.lName, ''), '-') ASC SEPARATOR ' | ') AS fName FROM DemographicContact
LEFT JOIN provider ON DemographicContact.contactId = provider.provider_no AND DemographicContact.type = 0
LEFT JOIN Contact ON DemographicContact.contactId = Contact.id AND DemographicContact.type = 2
LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ON DemographicContact.contactId = professionalSpecialists.specId AND DemographicContact.type = 3
WHERE demographicNo=${demographic};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.last_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.lastName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.lName, ''), '') ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.last_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.lastName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.lName, ''), '-') ASC SEPARATOR ' | ') AS lName FROM DemographicContact
LEFT JOIN provider ON DemographicContact.contactId = provider.provider_no AND DemographicContact.type = 0
LEFT JOIN Contact ON DemographicContact.contactId = Contact.id AND DemographicContact.type = 2
LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ON DemographicContact.contactId = professionalSpecialists.specId AND DemographicContact.type = 3
WHERE demographicNo=${demographic};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COALESCE(NULLIF(property.value, ''), NULLIF(Contact.fax, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.fax, ''), '') ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.last_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.lastName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.lName, ''), '-') ASC SEPARATOR ' | ') AS faxNumber FROM DemographicContact
LEFT JOIN provider ON DemographicContact.contactId = provider.provider_no AND DemographicContact.type = 0
LEFT JOIN property ON property.provider_no = DemographicContact.contactId AND DemographicContact.type = 0 AND property.name='faxnumber'
LEFT JOIN Contact ON DemographicContact.contactId = Contact.id AND DemographicContact.type = 2
LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ON DemographicContact.contactId = professionalSpecialists.specId AND DemographicContact.type = 3
WHERE demographicNo=${demographic};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.work_phone, ''), NULLIF(Contact.workPhone, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.phone, ''), '') ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.last_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.lastName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.lName, ''), '-') ASC SEPARATOR ' | ') AS phone FROM DemographicContact
LEFT JOIN provider ON DemographicContact.contactId = provider.provider_no AND DemographicContact.type = 0
LEFT JOIN Contact ON DemographicContact.contactId = Contact.id AND DemographicContact.type = 2
LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ON DemographicContact.contactId = professionalSpecialists.specId AND DemographicContact.type = 3
WHERE demographicNo=${demographic};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COALESCE( specialty.specialtydesc, IF(dc.role = '25', 'INTERNAL', NULL), # Role 25 is not found in the specialty table dc.role, '') ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.last_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.lastName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.lName, ''), '-') ASC SEPARATOR ' | ') AS role FROM DemographicContact dc
LEFT JOIN provider ON dc.contactId = provider.provider_no AND dc.type = 0
LEFT JOIN Contact ON dc.contactId = Contact.id AND dc.type = 2
LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ON dc.contactId = professionalSpecialists.specId AND dc.type = 3
LEFT JOIN specialty ON dc.role REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' # Only join on role when it's an int. If it's a string then take it 'as-is' AND (dc.role = specialty.specialty OR CONCAT('0', dc.role) = specialty.specialty)
WHERE dc.demographicNo=${demographic};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.address, ''), NULLIF(Contact.address, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.address, ''), '') ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(provider.last_name, ''), NULLIF(Contact.lastName, ''), NULLIF(professionalSpecialists.lName, ''), '-') ASC SEPARATOR ' | ') AS address FROM DemographicContact dc
LEFT JOIN provider ON dc.contactId = provider.provider_no AND dc.type = 0
LEFT JOIN Contact ON dc.contactId = Contact.id AND dc.type = 2
LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ON dc.contactId = professionalSpecialists.specId AND dc.type = 3
WHERE demographicNo=${demographic};

SELECT ps.lName, ps.fName FROM ( SELECT ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') AS original_name, ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fd') AS doctor_no, IF(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') regexp '^Dr.', TRIM(substr(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') from 4)), ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') ) as full_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} ) as q LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON if(q.doctor_no is not null and q.doctor_no > 0, q.doctor_no = ps.referralNo, coalesce(LCASE(substr(ps.fName,1,1)) = LCASE(substr(if(locate(' ', q.full_name) != 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.full_name, ' ', 1), null),1,1)), true) and LCASE(ps.lName) = LCASE(substring_index(q.full_name, ' ', -1))) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) = 1

SELECT ps.lName FROM ( SELECT ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') AS original_name, ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fd') AS doctor_no, IF(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') regexp '^Dr.', TRIM(substr(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') from 4)), ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') ) as full_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} ) as q LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON if(q.doctor_no is not null and q.doctor_no > 0, q.doctor_no = ps.referralNo, coalesce(LCASE(substr(ps.fName,1,1)) = LCASE(substr(if(locate(' ', q.full_name) != 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.full_name, ' ', 1), null),1,1)), true) and LCASE(ps.lName) = LCASE(substring_index(q.full_name, ' ', -1))) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) = 1

SELECT ps.address AS raddress FROM ( SELECT ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') AS original_name, ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fd') AS doctor_no, IF(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') regexp '^Dr.', TRIM(substr(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') from 4)), ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') ) as full_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} ) as q LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON if(q.doctor_no IS NOT NULL AND q.doctor_no > 0, q.doctor_no = ps.referralNo, COALESCE(LCASE(substr(ps.fName,1,1)) = LCASE(SUBSTR(if(locate(' ', q.full_name) != 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.full_name, ' ', 1), null),1,1)), true) and LCASE(ps.lName) = LCASE(substring_index(q.full_name, ' ', -1))) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) = 1

SELECT ps.phone FROM ( SELECT ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') AS original_name, ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fd') AS doctor_no, IF(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') regexp '^Dr.', TRIM(substr(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') from 4)), ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') ) as full_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} ) as q LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON if(q.doctor_no IS NOT NULL and q.doctor_no > 0, q.doctor_no = ps.referralNo, COALESCE(LCASE(SUBSTR(ps.fName,1,1)) = LCASE(SUBSTR(if(locate(' ', q.full_name) != 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.full_name, ' ', 1), null),1,1)), true) and LCASE(ps.lName) = LCASE(substring_index(q.full_name, ' ', -1))) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) = 1

SELECT ps.fax FROM ( SELECT ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') AS original_name, ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fd') AS doctor_no, IF(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') regexp '^Dr.', TRIM(substr(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') from 4)), ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') ) as full_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} ) as q LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON if(q.doctor_no IS NOT NULL and q.doctor_no > 0, q.doctor_no = ps.referralNo, COALESCE(LCASE(SUBSTR(ps.fName,1,1)) = LCASE(SUBSTR(if(locate(' ', q.full_name) != 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.full_name, ' ', 1), null),1,1)), true) and LCASE(ps.lName) = LCASE(substring_index(q.full_name, ' ', -1))) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) = 1

SELECT ps.referralNo FROM ( SELECT ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') AS original_name, ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fd') AS doctor_no, IF(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') regexp '^Dr.', TRIM(substr(ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//rd') from 4)), ExtractValue(family_doctor_2, '//fdname') ) as full_name FROM demographic WHERE demographic_no = ${demographic} ) as q LEFT JOIN professionalSpecialists ps ON if(q.doctor_no IS NOT NULL and q.doctor_no > 0, q.doctor_no = ps.referralNo, COALESCE(LCASE(SUBSTR(ps.fName,1,1)) = LCASE(SUBSTR(if(locate(' ', q.full_name) != 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.full_name, ' ', 1), null),1,1)), true) and LCASE(ps.lName) = LCASE(substring_index(q.full_name, ' ', -1))) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) = 1

SELECT billingreferral.last_name, billingreferral.first_name FROM billingreferral, demographic WHERE demographic.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(billingreferral.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(demographic.family_doctor_2, '/fd') = billingreferral.referral_no

SELECT CONCAT( b.address1, IF( b.address1 ='', '', '\n' ), ', ', b.city, ', ', b.province, ', ', b.postal ) AS raddress FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor_2, '/fd') = b.referral_no
SELECT b.phone FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor_2, '/fd') = b.referral_no
SELECT b.fax FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor_2, '/fd') = b.referral_no
SELECT b.referral_no FROM billingreferral b, demographic d WHERE d.demographic_no=${demographic} AND LENGTH(b.referral_no) > 0 AND EXTRACTVALUE(d.family_doctor_2, '/fd') = b.referral_no
